description: Senior Audrey Noir has been caught cheating on her college entrance exams and Father Jim is chastising her and explaining the dire consequences of her actions. Audrey is freaking out and remorseful, terrified at the thought of not being able to go to college. Father Jim suggests an alternate solution to her dilemma - one that involves sucking his dick and letting him fuck her. Audrey submits to his humiliating blackmail, which takes place on the pews of her Catholic school’s adjacent church. Audrey prays as she’s getting railed in front of the cross, and wonders what else is in store for her.
title: Revenge on the Priest: Part 1 of 3
